pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 21, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, April 21, 2016:

New York

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit New York University and will hold a Q&A with students.

Auditorium
Helen and Martin Kimmel Center for University Life
New York University
60 Washington Square South
New York City, NY

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will train at Gleason's Gym.

Gleasonâ€™s Gym
77 Front Street
Brooklyn, NY

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 1:00 p.m. for accreditation
  • Photo opportunity only

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
